column2: "Far too many ARKS members fail to play FUN Scratch tickets. It's such a waste, if you ask me."
"There's no point in just earning FUN, you know. Playing FUN Scratch tickets gives your FUN true meaning."
"And what about you? You ought to go play a Scratch ticket, while we're on the subject. Do it."
"Do what, you say? Haven't you been listening? A FUN Scratch ticket! Go play one!"
"Well, what are you waiting for? Get to it already, before there's no more fun to be had!"
